title: Train Fault Causing Delay on East West Line

title_translations.zh-Hans: 东西线列车故障导致延误
title_translations.ms: Gangguan Kereta Api Menyebabkan Kelewatan di Laluan East West
title_translations.ta: கிழக்கு மேற்கு பாதையில் தாமதத்தை ஏற்படுத்தும் ரயில் கோளாறு

updates.text: [EWL] CLEARED: Train svcs from #Bugis to #Queenstown have resumed. Free regular bus svcs have ended.
[EWL]UPDATE:Train fault cleared,normal train svc https://t.co/pnKyY12xOQ regular bus svc are still available btwn Bugis & Queenstown.
[EWL]:Due to a train fault,pls add 30min train travel time from #Bugis to #Queenstown towards #TuasLink.Not linked to new signalling project
